description: in melange_ip_lib get_tenatn_id_by_net_id we search for the right ipam_teant_id by calling out to get_allocated_ips. It triggers going to the next tenant_id in the list by catching KeyError, but melange_connection is raising a bare Exception if the block is not found for that tenant.
title: Melange_ipam_lib needs to catch the right exceptions

comments.content: in melange_ip_lib get_tenatn_id_by_net_id we search for the right ipam_teant_id by calling out to get_allocated_ips. It triggers going to the next tenant_id in the list by catching KeyError, but melange_connection is raising a bare Exception if the block is not found for that tenant.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/5912
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/5912

    Continue on the the next tenant_id on 400 codes
    
    * Melange connection raises Exception if the response is > 400
    * Fixes lp967261
